title: Photographs by Izis
description: The 42 photographs in this exhibition were taken by Izis in Israel, London, and France. The images were representative of the pictorial school of photography. Art Institute Curator of Photography at the time, Peter Pollack, suggested these photographs were “. . . not so much documentary as they are lyrical, poetic, and essentially beautifully designed pictures of the zestful, humane, and exciting vision he selects. . .”
